attributes.action: Change the law, so that Juror's on trials MUST be legally informed of their legal right to make use of Jury Equity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change the law, so that Juror's on trials MUST be legally informed of their legal right to make use of Jury Equity - Which means, when a Jury is asked to reach a verdict, they are also legally entitled to judge that the law upon which the defendant is being judged upon, is in fact unjust, and should not be held as law in that case.
